text: Na sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 56. I will not, in an inhabited area, throw away bowl-rinsing water that has grains of rice in it: a training to be observed.
๕๖. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่เทน้ำล้างบาตรมีเมล็ดข้าวในละแวกบ้าน”
56. I shall not in an inhabited area throw away bowl­washing water which has rice grains in it: this is a training to be done.
